content.default: Hey, %streamer% is live on Twitch streaming %game%! Check it out at %url% !
content.description: Message that gets send if the streamer goes live

ChannelID to send the live-messages. The first channel is to notify when the first streamer goes live, the second is to notify when the second streamer goes live and so on. It's also possible that some or all notifications get send to the same Channel
ID of the Client, which is used to check if the Streamer is live
Secret of the Twitch-Client, which is used to check if the Streamer is live
Streamers where a notification should send when they start streaming
Interval (in seconds) in which it is tested whether the streamer is live. This value must be higher than 60
